required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TMTP1 Targeting Micro-metastasis LN in Laparoscopic SLN Detection in Cervical Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Novel Tumor Targeted Fluorescent Peptide TMTP1-ICG Mapping in Laparoscopic Sentinel Micro-metastasis Lymph Node Detection in Cervical Cancer Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: Investigators aimed to determine the validity of the investigator's novel tumor targeted fluorescent peptide TMTP1-ICG to increased accuracy of laparoscopic SLN mapping

primary_outcome.measure: Detection rate of micro-metastasis sentinel lymph node
primary_outcome.description: Detection of micro-metastasis sentinel lymph node per patient

secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity of SLN mapping of TMTP1-ICG compared to the sensitivity of SLN mapping of ICG or ICG-CP
Specificity of SLN mapping of TMTP1-ICG compared to the sensitivity of SLN mapping of ICG or ICG-CP

intervention.description: The ICG powder was diluted and injected into the cervix, divided into 3 and 9 o'clock position, 4 hours before surgery.
The ICG-CP powder was diluted and injected into the cervix, divided into 3 and 9 o'clock position, 4 hours before surgery.
The ICG-TMTP1 powder was diluted and injected into the cervix, divided into 3 and 9 o'clock position, 4 hours before surgery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Without childbearing requirements at the time of consent.
- FIGO stage IB1, IIA1 cervical cancer and is a candidate for laparoscopy intervention, with lymph node dissection being a part of the surgical plan.
- Subject has provided written informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Breast-feeding or pregnant.
- Ongoing participation in another clinical trial with an investigational drug with 3 months
- Own allergy towards ICG and/or alcohol
- Diagnosis of bacterial vaginosis, fungal vaginitis, sexually transmitted diseases
- Patients with cardiac dysfunction or hepatic insufficiency or renal insufficiency

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, HUST

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
